oai_dc:dc.dc:title: POVM optimization of classical correlations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hamieh, S.
Kobes, R.
Zaraket, H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study the problem of optimization over positive valued-operator measure to extract classical correlation in a bipartite quantum system. The proposed method is applied to binary states only. Moreover, to illustrate this method, an explicit example is studied in details.
Comment: 9 pages, 1 figures, Accepted for publication in Phys. Rev. A
